document.title: Hot Topic: Fair Pay Initiative (Section 13(a)(1) of the Fair Labor Standards Act): The Executive, Administrative, Professional, and Computer Employees Exemptions Revisited-1
document.abstract: The Fair Pay Initiative nearly triples the salary threshold for overtime, establishes that exemptions do not apply to certain jobs, and identifies those employees who must be paid a minimum wage and premium overtime wages.
